Name: usecatupd
column6: user can update system catalogs. (even a superuser cannot do this unless this column is true.)

Name: userepl
column6: user can initiate streaming replication and put the system in and out of backup mode.

Name: valuntil
column6: password expiry time (only used for password authentication)

Name: useconfig
column6: session defaults for run-time configuration variables
